name: client-grpc

jsDoc.doc: Make a server streaming RPC call.
Make a client streaming RPC call.
Make a bidirectional streaming RPC call.

Error class for ConnectRPC/gRPC errors.

Use `statusCode` to distinguish between different gRPC error codes.

Error thrown when a network-level failure occurs.

This error indicates that the request could not be processed by the server
due to network issues (connection refused, DNS resolution failure, timeout, etc.).
Unlike ConnectRpcError, this error means the server was never reached.
Metadata to send with the request.

Whether to throw ConnectRpcError on non-OK responses (code !== 0) or failures.
Overrides ConnectRpcClientConfig.throwOnError.

tags.value: @default false (inherited from client config if not specified)

jsDoc.doc:
ConnectRPC response union type.

Use `processed` to distinguish between server responses and failures:
- `processed === true`: Server responded (Success or Error)
- `processed === false`: Request failed (Failure)

Use `ok` to check for success:
- `ok === true`: Success (statusCode === 0)
- `ok === false`: Error or Failure

ConnectRPC response with gRPC error (statusCode !== 0).

The server processed the request but returned an error status.
Response trailers (sent at end of RPC).

Failed ConnectRPC request (network error, connection refused, etc.).

The request did not reach gRPC processing.
No raw response (request didn't reach server).
Response trailers (sent at end of RPC).

ConnectRPC/gRPC status codes.
These codes are used by both gRPC and ConnectRPC protocols.

ConnectRPC/gRPC status code type.
Derived from ConnectRpcStatus values.

Rich error detail from google.rpc.Status.

ConnectRPC errors can include structured details encoded in error responses.
These details follow the google.protobuf.Any format with a type URL and value.

Type URL identifying the error detail type.
Common types include:
- "type.googleapis.com/google.rpc.BadRequest"
- "type.googleapis.com/google.rpc.DebugInfo"
- "type.googleapis.com/google.rpc.RetryInfo"
- "type.googleapis.com/google.rpc.QuotaFailure"

Decoded error detail value.
The structure depends on the typeUrl.

FileDescriptorSet message type from @bufbuild/protobuf.
This is the decoded protobuf message containing file descriptors.
Get the name of a ConnectRPC/gRPC status code.
Check if a number is a valid ConnectRPC/gRPC status code.

tags.doc:
```typescript
isConnectRpcStatusCode(0);   // true
isConnectRpcStatusCode(16);  // true
isConnectRpcStatusCode(99);  // false
```

jsDoc.doc:
Reflection API for ConnectRPC client.
Only available when client is created with schema: "reflection".
List all available services on the server.

tags.doc: Error if reflection is not enabled

jsDoc.doc: Get detailed information about a specific service.

tags.doc: Error if reflection is not enabled

jsDoc.doc: Get methods for a specific service.

tags.doc: Error if reflection is not enabled
Error if reflection is not enabled

jsDoc.doc: Skip server certificate verification (use only for testing).

Configuration for creating a gRPC client.

This is a subset of ConnectRpcClientConfig with protocol fixed to "grpc".

Create a new gRPC client instance.

This is a thin wrapper around `createConnectRpcClient` with `protocol: "grpc"` fixed.
The client provides Server Reflection support for runtime service discovery.
